      • getDefaultTranslationContext

        public static TranslationContext getDefaultTranslationContext()
        Default translation context for tests. Current language is 'en'. Default language is 'fr'.

      • getDefaultTranslationContext

        public static TranslationContext getDefaultTranslationContext(EditorStore editorStore,
                                                              java.util.List<AmpContentTranslation> contentTranslations)
        Default translation context for tests. Current language is 'en'. Default language is 'fr'. Editor or content translation values can be overridden here and will be used in validation.

      • filter

        public static java.util.Set<ConstraintViolation> filter(java.util.Set<ConstraintViolation> violations,
                                                        java.lang.Class<?> validatorClass)
        Filter violations and leave only the ones matching a specific validator class. Useful when testing a validator on an object annotated with other validators.
